A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hopeless sad movie with no character or plot development . Everything mildly interesting from the force awakens you hoped would be continued or expanded on are completely thrown out the window. This movie feels more like a multi million dollar troll. From characters arcs seemingly moving more backwards than forward as well as a plot that seems to lead nowhere. Everything the characters try to accomplish fails and every time you think something moved forward it was undone one or two scenes later. Pure disappointment.
